desc: Introducing the patented Green Pod Recycling Bag. Separate, store and transport your recyclable waste cleanly and with no fuss. Portable, re-usable and robust recycling bags. Patented technology, waterproofed, made from recycled materials, up to 120kg. Lifetime guarantee, free UK delivery.

layout.text: Introducing the patented Green Pod Recycling Bag
Separate, store and transport your recyclable waste cleanly and with no fuss.
